content: Tonight 04/08/09 at sundown the celebration/rememberance of PassOver starts. Even tho I am not commanded to observe this Holyday, my wife and I still have a festive commemritave meal Isreal was commanded to Remember, and to celebrate this occasion in a speacial way. Shalom D.J.
reply: Tonight 04/08/09 at sundown the celebration/rememberance of PassOver starts. Even tho I am not commanded to observe this Holyday, my wife and I still have a festive commemritave meal Isreal was commanded to Remember, and to celebrate this occasion in a speacial way. Shalom D.J.
title: PassOver
